article_title: Start out 2016 with the 9th annual Egg Nog Jog
article_text:
Runners, joggers and walkers are invited to participate. (Source: Town of Marana)

Registration now open for the Egg Nog Jog (Source: Tucson News Now)

The town of Marana invites everyone to start off the new year with a 5K walk, run, or jog.

Friday morning, the town is hosting its 9th annual Egg Nog Jog/5K at Continental Reserve Park located off Silverbell Road.

Organizers expect more than 400 runners, making it Marana’s largest running event of the year.

Thinking about kick-starting that fitness resolution or just want to join the fun today, sign up is still available at the race on-site this morning. Check in begins at 7:30 a.m. The race starts at 9:30 a.m. and features a sanctioned 5K route, professional race time, and a raffle with prizes from local gyms and fitness retailers.

For more information, visit http://www.maranaevents.com/run/

Follow Maria Hechanova on Twitter @MariaHechanova and watch her on KOLD News 13 till 7 a.m. for more on this run.



Copyright 2016 Tucson News Now. All rights reserved.
